course.subject: MECH
course.name: Solid Mechanics I
course.description: Forces, moments, equilibrium; principles of virtual work; analysis of structural members under axial load, torsion and bending; shear force and bending moment diagrams; statically indeterminate trusses; buckling and structural stability.

reviews.author: sadness
reviews.comment_content:
機械工程的入門科，相當於CIVL的Mechanics of Material分析固體在力或力矩作用下的變化
1. Stress and strain and their relationship
2. Axially loaded members - stress, displacement and statically indeterminate problems
3. Torsion – torsional diagram, shear strain and stress, displacement
4. Transformation of stress and strain
5. Pure bending beam
a. Shear force and bending moment diagram
b. Normal strain and normal stress
c. Design of beam
6. Beam – shear stress
7. Beam – deflection and statically indeterminate problems
8. Columns – stability, buckling
reviews.comment_teaching:
Prof. 上堂十分沉悶，節奏非常慢。
內容主要由prof講, lecture notes很普通。上堂用visualizer，用原子筆同紙來教書, 不過她常常寫錯字，又不像白板那樣可以擦掉重寫，最後整張紙就出現很多大大少少刪掉了的地方。
Prof.講書速度適中, 甚至偏慢, 只要專心上堂不難follow, 不過她並不能提高你對學習solid mechanics的興趣. 假如你是mech major, 必修這科就無話可說. 要是你有得選擇, 讀CIVL2120 比這科好
reviews.comment_grading:
正常grade, 應高分的高分, 應低分的低分.
B range
reviews.comment_workload:
Work load唔重, 每星期一份HW, 每次3-5條

Homework 15%
In-class Quiz 5%
Midterm Exam 30%
Final Exam 50%
